  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebCmsDataImporter

    @Component
public class WebCmsDomainImporter
extends AbstractWebCmsDataImporter<WebCmsDomain,WebCmsDomain>
    Creates one (or many) @WebCmsDomains from a yml file

    0.0.3
    Author:
    Steven Gentens

        protected WebCmsDomain retrieveExistingInstance(WebCmsDataEntry data)

      • createDto

        protected WebCmsDomain createDto(WebCmsDataEntry data,
                                 WebCmsDomain existing,
                                 WebCmsDataAction action,
                                 Map<String,Object> dataValues)
        Description copied from class: AbstractWebCmsDataImporter
        Create a DTO object for either a new instance or an existing instance. If the existing parameter is null a new instance should be created.

        Note that the DTO should not apply the data entry values yet, but the data entry can be used to determine the initial type of instance that needs to be created.

        If the DTO is null, the import will be skipped but properties will still be called.

        Specified by:
        createDto in class AbstractWebCmsDataImporter<WebCmsDomain,WebCmsDomain>
        Parameters:
        data - entry
        existing - instance or null if a new instance should be created
        action - purpose for which the DTO should be created (create, delete or replace)
        dataValues - modifiable collection of the data values that will be applied afterwards
        Returns:
        DTO

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
